perturbation.original_text:
4.       Prices and Terms.  The price for the  Product as set forth in Section 9
herein,  sold by SIERRA to ENVISION,  shall be subject to change due to
changes  in  manufacturing  costs and so as to  maximize  profits;  any
changes in price for the Product  shall not be applicable to previously
accepted  orders  and  shall be made  with at least  ninety  (90)  days
advance  notice  in  writing  and in good  faith by  conference  of the
parties.  ENVISION shall not resell the Product alone. Terms of payment
will be 1/3 upon  placement  of order and 2/3  balance  net thirty (30)
days  or as  mutually  agreed  upon in  writing  between  the  parties.
Delivery will be F.O.B.  ENVISION shall be responsible for all costs of
shipping from SIERRA to ENVISION.
perturbation.changed_text:
4.       Prices and Terms.  The price for the  Product as set forth in Section 9
herein,  sold by SIERRA to ENVISION,  shall be subject to change due to
changes  in  manufacturing  costs;  any
changes in price for the Product  shall be applicable to previously
accepted  orders  and  shall be made  with at least  thirty (30)  days
advance  notice  in  writing.  ENVISION shall not resell the Product alone. Terms of payment
will be 1/3 upon  placement  of order and 2/3  balance  net sixty (60)
days.
Delivery will be F.O.B.  ENVISION shall be responsible for all costs of
shipping from SIERRA to ENVISION.
perturbation.explanation: The original text states that price changes are not applicable to previously accepted orders and require 90 days' notice, while the modified text makes price changes applicable and reduces the notice period to 30 days. This creates a contradiction in the pricing terms, making it unclear when a price change is valid and leading to potential disputes.

perturbation.original_text:
7.       Term.  The  term of this  Agreement  shall  be two (2)  years  from the
Effective  Date with  automatic  annual  renewals  thereafter  provided
either  party does not provide  sixty (60) days  notice of  termination
prior to the renewal date or the Agreement is not otherwise  terminated
as set forth in Section 8.
perturbation.changed_text:
7.       Term.  The  term of this  Agreement  shall  be one (1)  year  from the
Effective  Date with  automatic  annual  renewals  thereafter  provided
either  party does not provide  ninety (90) days  notice of  termination
prior to the renewal date or the Agreement is not otherwise  terminated
as set forth in Section 8.
perturbation.explanation: The original term is for two years with 60 days termination notice, the modified term is for one year with 90 days notice. This contradiction impacts the length of the agreement and the notification required for termination.

perturbation.original_text:
9.       Purchase  Requirements.  During the  term of this  Agreement,  ENVISION
will  exclusively  purchase  the  Product  from   SIERRA.  The  parties
mutually agree to the Purchase Price of:

         Product                          Purchase Price          
-----------------------------------------------
          A.  SierraSil                    Per Sierra Sil's wholesale price list.
perturbation.changed_text:
9.       Purchase  Requirements.  During the  term of this  Agreement,  ENVISION
will  exclusively  purchase  the  Product  from   SIERRA, except for sales made directly from Sierra Sil's website. The  parties
mutually agree to the Purchase Price of:

         Product                          Purchase Price          
-----------------------------------------------
          A.  SierraSil                    Per Sierra Sil's wholesale price list.
perturbation.explanation: The original agreement stipulates ENVISION will exclusively purchase the product from SIERRA. The modified version introduces an exception, 'except for sales made directly from Sierra Sil's website.' This creates ambiguity regarding ENVISION's exclusivity and potential sales channels, leading to uncertainty in purchase requirements and distribution rights. Does ENVISION still have exclusive distribution rights?
